3: This way.
I can see the stairs to the next level!
We can get to the roof through here.
Changyu's there.
Careful.
Bang!
Looks like we're getting closer to the source of danger.
Tsk, dropping Corrupted on us again.
Commandant, if I'm not wrong, the Rail Heterozygote up there is releasing more and more Corrupted into the carriages.
Is it trying to claim this train as its nest?
We've already seen its 'oothecae'.
It's... something I wish to never see again.
Let's take care of them and move on.
No.
There's no time.
I'll create an opening so you guys can go up to the roof first.
Changyu needs backup, now!
What about you, Sophia?
I'll catch up with you as soon as I'm done here.
If that thing is right on top of here, then your team is more suitable to deal with it than me.
Please.
All right.
...If you require assistance, please let us know immediately. We'll come to your aid once we've ensured Changyu's safety.
Yup!!!
